strow.stentry: References a module of type "auto-complete" where auto-complete drop-down list output is designed.

Delay in milliseconds before the auto-complete can run the query against the database. Delay and number of characters properties must be reached for triggering database search. If left empty, the Framework default value applies.

Number of characters to enter in the text field before the auto-complete can run the query against the database. Number of characters and Delay properties must be reached for triggering database search. If left empty, the Framework default value applies.

Display an Favorite icon on the right side of the text field. When the user clicks on this icon, the items marked as favorite are listed. The output format is the one used for the auto-complete. As a consequence, this Boolean can be set to True only for search type property with values: ""Auto-complete only" and "Auto-complete and Search".
Provide Access to history of items

Display an open book icon on the right side of the text field. When the user clicks on this icon, the history of recent selected items is displayed. The output format is the one used for the auto-complete. As a consequence, this Boolean can be set to True only for search type property with values: ""Auto-complete only" and "Auto-complete and Search".

ul.li: Search Only: display a magnifying glass icon on the right side of the text field. Event of type "Search" is required on the text field for this icon.
Auto-complete only: database look-up triggered when typing characters in the text field.
Auto-complete and Search: Auto-complete and search functionalities apply on the text field.

stentry.p: Name of the form this widget belongs to. The value must be prefixed by the widget group used within the form. For instance, if widgets of the module where the search field is used have a widget group value = "form", the search field widget group must be different and start with "form". For example: "searchForm"
